bio: Hello! I'm Bishwa Thakur, a software developer specializing in mobile and full-stack development.
With experience in Kotlin, Flutter and React Native development, I focus on creating efficient and scalable applications.
I'm passionate about solving complex problems and building user-friendly applications that make a real impact.
personalBio: I'm a software developer driven by curiosity and a passion for solving real-world problems through technology.
As an active member of CYBERLABS and other tech societies at IIT (ISM) Dhanbad, I regularly contribute to collaborative development and innovation.
Outside of code, I explore creativity through filmmaking with Lights Camera ISM and share laughs as part of the Comedy Club.
With a unique blend of technical expertise and artistic expression, I bring fresh perspectives to every project I work on.
